survey_name: Mobile Banking App Feature Prioritization Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather customer feedback on which features are most important in a mobile banking app to prioritize development and improvements.

questions.question_text: How often do you use your bank's mobile app?
questions.routing_logic: This question appears for all respondents.
questions.client_notes: This helps segment users by engagement level. Consider using a radio button for single selection.

script.question_text: How often do you use your bank's mobile app?
script.routing_logic: This question appears for all respondents.

questions.question_text: Which of the following mobile banking features do you use most frequently? (Select all that apply)
questions.routing_logic: This question appears for all respondents who answered 'Daily', 'Weekly', or 'Monthly' to Q1.
questions.client_notes: This identifies high-usage features. Checkboxes allow multiple selections.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: checkbox (MULTI_CHOICE). Skip if Q1 response was 'Rarely' or 'Never'.

script.question_text: Which of the following mobile banking features do you use most frequently? (Select all that apply)
script.routing_logic: This question appears for all respondents who answered 'Daily', 'Weekly', or 'Monthly' to Q1.

questions.question_text: What additional features would you like to see in your mobile banking app?
questions.routing_logic: This question appears for all respondents who answered 'Daily', 'Weekly', or 'Monthly' to Q1.
questions.client_notes: Open-ended to capture unmet needs. Keep the text box mobile-friendly.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: open text (OPEN_TEXT). Skip if Q1 response was 'Rarely' or 'Never'.

script.question_text: What additional features would you like to see in your mobile banking app?
script.routing_logic: This question appears for all respondents who answered 'Daily', 'Weekly', or 'Monthly' to Q1.

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with your current mobile banking app's security features?
questions.routing_logic: This question appears for all respondents who answered 'Daily', 'Weekly', or 'Monthly' to Q1.
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for satisfaction measurement.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: radio button (SINGLE_CHOICE). Skip if Q1 response was 'Rarely' or 'Never'.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with your current mobile banking app's security features?
script.routing_logic: This question appears for all respondents who answered 'Daily', 'Weekly', or 'Monthly' to Q1.

questions.question_text: Would you be willing to use biometric authentication (fingerprint or face recognition) for your mobile banking app?
questions.routing_logic: This question appears for all respondents who answered 'Daily', 'Weekly', or 'Monthly' to Q1.
questions.client_notes: This gauges readiness for advanced security features.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: radio button (SINGLE_CHOICE). Skip if Q1 response was 'Rarely' or 'Never'.

script.question_text: Would you be willing to use biometric authentication (fingerprint or face recognition) for your mobile banking app?
script.routing_logic: This question appears for all respondents who answered 'Daily', 'Weekly', or 'Monthly' to Q1.
